about_the_game:
KEYBOARD

He plays with the arrows on the keyboard
He Plays With the Arrows On the Keyboard Or Wasd
-----------------------------------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION: The game is Christmas and you can play Christmas tree or Santa
A Christmas game with a shooting game everything is not there yet and unspoken because I speak Czech !!

DESCRIPTION 2: so everything is nice in the game because it's Christmas and at Christmas sweets are given as gifts and everything is possible and I don't want to spoil Christmas so the 2d game will be on steam at Christmas and I hope someone will play it
------------------------------------------------
Genre: Survival, Shooting Game, Christmas, other
GAME: Christmas, player, enemies and so on

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE GT 1030 OC 2G, 2GB GDDR5
  • Storage: 214 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: -
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8,10,11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Asus RX5700XT-8G
  • Storage: 214 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: it's a 2d game focused on Christmas where it's snowing and you have to shoot candy at people, the game should be fun and have nice music ---------------------------------------------- your end is a goal where you have to get all the way to the end and you have two endings which are secret and normal
